attributes.title: Foreign Malware
attributes.review:
This app gave me so much malware on my phone and terrible advice. Even if I closed the app, inappropriate pictures of models with our great presidents popped up on my phone. It even had photos of underage kids in revealing clothing with our wondrous President. This is unacceptable. 

Also, I wanted advice on what to do to feel that didnâ€™t support trump. And it told me to shout TRUMP 2020 in their face. I tried that and got punched. Terrible advise. Also, when I asked it about wearing masks, it called me a socialist. I would NEVER be one of the radical left. So it told me to not wear a mask and make sure I insult any who does. I did this, and once again got punched. Now I have 2 black eyes. Terrible advice. Terrible app.

attributes.title: PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: So I got this app so that I could check out the current presidentâ€™s ways of communication but I soon found out that it was giving my phone a terrible virus. The actual software damaged my phone but the content of the app damaged my soul. Iâ€™ve never seen such vile things in my life. Iâ€™m currently writing this from my new phone, as one day after downloading the app, my phone overheated due to the app running in the background. My phone exploded, sending shrapnel flying into my face and body, which I am still recovering from. On top of being injured, my house was also set ablaze by this explosion, and I lost all of my belongings to the fire. Please do not get this app.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: Before I downloaded this app, my phone was working perfectly fine. However, after I downloaded it my phone started glitching and not working properly. I went to settings and it turns out that this app took of SO MUCH STORAGE! Also, this app sends so many notifications each day that I donâ€™t even see the notifications that are important. In fact, there are so many notifications that it made my phone die, when my phone normally stays charged for the whole day. I do not recommend this app because after I deleted it, everything went back to normal and all the problems I had after downloading it went away.

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: Hi, I was trying to download this app but it was taking forever! I thought that maybe it was because I had too many apps so I got rid of a few but it was still taking a long time to download. An hour later it finally downloads and it messed my whole phone up! My phone started to get a whole bunch of lag spikes and it was very slow, I had to restart my phone but it still had the same problem. This app is awful! My phone wasnâ€™t old and itâ€™s an iPhone. I asked my friend if she could download this app on her phone and see if it was having problems, same happened to her! Her phone was completely messed up as well!
